block.p: SUSSMAN - Roslyn. Manhattan Day School/Yeshiva Ohr Torah records with profound sorrow the passing of Roslyn Sussman, mother of MDS board member, Marvin Sussman, and of Judy Sokolow. May the entire family be comforted in this hour of their untimely loss. Manhattan Day School/Yeshiva Ohr Torah Rabbi Mordechai Besser, Principal George Karasick, President Elliot Gibber, Chairman of the Board

SUSSMAN - Roslyn. Lincoln Square Synagogue mourns with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member Mrs. Roslyn Sussman, mother of our members Marvin Sussman and Judy Sokolow. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Adam Mintz, Rabbi Ken Cappell, President

SUSSMAN-Roslyn. We mourn the loss of Roslyn Sussman, revered mother of our colleague and friend, Marvin S. Sussman. The entire Philipp Brothers Chemicals Organization joins in extending heartfelt condolences to Marvin, Judy and their respective families.
